sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS units ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, category TEXT, unit TEXT, name TEXT, value DOUBLE);
INSERT INTO units (category, unit, name, value) VALUES ('WEIGHT/MASS', 'g', 'Gram', 1)
